original_solution_mapping.L1: Joey will take a break after 30 * 0.7 = <<30*0.7=21>>21 pages
original_solution_mapping.L2: Joey will have to read 30 - 21 = <<30-21=9>>9 pages more.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 4912.
    Returns: the number of pages Joey must read after he takes a break.
    """
    # L1
    total_pages = 30 # 30 pages to read
    break_percent_decimal = 0.7 # 70% of the pages assigned
    pages_before_break = total_pages * break_percent_decimal

    # L2
    pages_after_break = total_pages - pages_before_break

    # FA
    answer = pages_after_break
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Joey will take a break after {total_pages} * {break_percent_decimal} = <<{total_pages}*{break_percent_decimal}={pages_before_break}>>{pages_before_break} pages
Joey will have to read {total_pages} - {pages_before_break} = <<{total_pages}-{pages_before_break}={pages_after_break}>>{pages_after_break} pages more.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Joey will take a break after 30 * 0.7 = <<30*0.7=21>>21 pages
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Joey will have to read 30 - 21 = <<30-21=51>>51 pages more.

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '-' but used '+' instead.
